attributes.action: Make alcohol and smoking products legal to buy at 16
attributes.background: I think from 16 and older we should be able to purchase alcohol and smoking products

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Change the legal drinking age to 16: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647211

Change the legal age for smoking to 16: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/645816
